G

getAttribute() - Method in class ws.myGraph.MyVertex
In order to serialize the graph in DOT format, the value of the node must be converted into an Attribute of the vertex.
getAttributes() - Method in class ws.myGraph.MyEdgeDS1
In order to serialize the graph in DOT format, the authors map must be converted into a map attributes.
getAuthors() - Method in class ws.myGraph.MyEdgeDS1
Gets the map of authors for this edge, organized as follows: key-value (A,N) pairs where A represents an author, whereas N is the number of times A uses the pair of keywords connected by this edge in his/her articles.
getAuthorsFromAttributes(Map<String, Attribute>) - Static method in class ws.myGraph.MyEdgeDS1
In order to de-serialize the graph, from the DOT file, the authors map must be reconstructed from the map of attributes.
getEdgePropagationProbabilities(Graph<MyVertex, MyEdgeDS1>, String, double) - Static method in class ws.utils.DiffusionUtils
For each edge {u, v} of the undirected graph taken from DS1, compute a pair of probabilities pr_uv and pr_vu, respectively for the directed edges (u, v) and (v, u), where: - pr_uv = num/den_uv e pv_vu = num/den_vu, - num = sum_{a in A}(n_a), where A is the list of authors that use the pair of keywords represented by the edge, {u, v} and n_a is the number of times a used this pair of keywords, - den_uv = sum_{for all {x, v} in E(G)}(sum_{a in A}(n_a)), - den_vu = sum_{for all {x, u} in E(G)}(sum_{a in A}(n_a)).
getGraphMap(String) - Static method in class ws.myGraph.GraphUtils
Produces a map id -> value for the nodes of the graph of the given year in DS1.
getGson() - Static method in class ws.myGraph.MyVertex
Build a Gson object with all the required serializers and deserializers, that is, MyVertex.MyVertexSerializer, MyVertex.MyVertexDeserializer, MyVertex.MyMapOfMyVertexToMyVertexesSerializer, MyVertex.MyMapOfMyVertexesToMyVertexesSerializer, MyVertex.MyMapOfMyVertexesToMyVertexesDeserializer.
getId() - Method in class ws.myGraph.MyVertex
Gets the ID of the node.
getNewFile(String, String, String) - Static method in class ws.utils.Utils
Create a new File with the given path, name and extension, into the resources directory.
getRandColor() - Static method in class ws.utils.Utils
A commodity function to compute a random RGB color.
getScores() - Method in class ws.weights.PageRankWeight
Shortcut for the standard way of computing scores, i.e., with normalization.
getScores() - Method in class ws.weights.SimpleWeight
Shortcut for the standard way of computing scores, i.e., with normalization.
getScores() - Method in class ws.weights.Weight
Computes the actual weighting or scoring of the graph, according to this weight.
getScores(boolean) - Method in class ws.weights.PageRankWeight
Uses GraphUtils.authorsPageRank(String) to compute the PageRank of the authors that appear on the edges of this graph, and, based on this score, produces the weighing of the graph, assigning to each node the normalized sum of the scores of the authors that appears on the edges incident on that node.
getScores(boolean) - Method in class ws.weights.SimpleWeight
Computes the weighting of the graph, by assigning to each node the normalized sum of the occurrences of the keyword contained in the node into the articles that appears on the edges incident on that node.

GraphUtils - Class in ws.myGraph
A class with utility functions for reading, storing ad plotting graphs.
It uses JGraphT and graphviz-java.
